trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.InfoMessage"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den metod som hanterar den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.InfoMessage"> </xref> händelsen för en <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleInfoMessageEventArgs> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleInfoMessageEventArgs>ombud kan du identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleInfoMessageEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om händelsehanterare delegater finns [NIB: händelser och delegater](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
